price: 4. Ya soló, tokelaki moto na lolenge ya kitoko,
arabic: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِيٓ أَحۡسَنِ تَقۡوِيمٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: laqad khalaqnā al-insāna fī aḥsani taqwīmin
